name: The Gubbio Project
description: The Gubbio Project located at St. John's in the Mission (1661 15th Street, San Francisco), offers a network of low-barrier, daytime support services for unhoused and vulnerable individuals. The program provides a safe sleep sanctuary, phone charging stations, Wifi and Coffee all for free. Other Services rotate throughout the week, such as street medicine, mobile vaccinations, HIV testing, art and writing workshops, legal record-clearing, and pet care. The Gubbio Project also participates in city
